title: Account Recovery Ticket from Permanent Suspension is not working...
body:
For God sake give me a solution already.

I made a ticket to remove my permanent suspension, a Rioter told me to make a new email as it was needed for such a ticket.
I made a new email.... and told them the new email in the support ticket.
They said log out my accounts and switch to answering on the new ticket send to my new email.
In the email I was asked to give a lot of info in proving I am the real account holder on the new ticket the linked me.

But the link isn't even working!!!! 

When I click the link it leads me to a login page. When I login I get this.

https://i.imgur.com/ol146fe.jpg

GET MY ACCOUNT BACK ONLINE!!!! ITS BEEN SEVERAL DAYS AND EVERYONE IS HAVING FUN IN STAR GAURDIAN MODE AND I HAVNT EVEN PLAYED IT!!!!!
WHEN WILL YOU GET IT BACK UP!!!! WHEN THE EVENT IS FINISHED!

AND GET YOUR SYSTEMS WORKING FIRST!!!

YOU WANT ANSWERS TO QUESTIONS IN A 404 LINK!!!

I requested a new ticket since it has a 404 Link and the New link emailed to me a 2nd time also gives a 404 Error.

FIX IT!!!

replies.body:
Thank you. My account is back online and working.

Just in time to play Star Guardian mode.

Consider this issue solved.

Bumping for Justice. when are you going to help me? I send email to support@riotgames.com   It's been 7 hours already.

And thanks to this stupid system you ruined my entire weekend and I didn't play at all. I have missed out on Star Guardian event.

What is this Riot? What kind of justice is this?

I keep encountering tons of scripters which usually my entire team agree upon as they seem to be avoiding multiple skillshots from different directions in small narrow spaces till the end of the game not getting hit by one.... those people are running rampant.

And then you have guys like me who haven't done a wrong thing since Season 2 when he created his account... and he's banned for free from playing a mode he waited so long for.

I would appreciate that. I am going to email right away in a while.

I've missed out the entire Star Gaurdian event. I wanna play it so badly.

EDIT: I just email. Kindly help me out.

Hey, I know there's a lot of steps involved but our account team wants to be absolutely sure that they're speaking to the owner of the account.  The 404 error link is odd, what url was it navigating to?  I recommend using our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), but you can also email us via support@riotgames.com.  Just be sure to reference any previous ticket numbers you've had, and we'll dig deeper to help!
